__e: It never entered my mind that any of these people were communists.
You let them do it all because they aren't Commies.
If it is Communists, I will find them and find the guns.
We bombed a train station in Italy and blamed the Communists.
The government's got us seeing Communists in our soup.
I will say to him "You got to get rid of the communists in your army."
If you're prepared to fight the Communists, we can mean a lot for each other.
I told my brother he was sick, for trusting two German communists!
What's he got to do with communists? The Witzels are communists!
